subject: Int'l Conf. AMSMS2019 paper(s) indexed by EI, Scopus, ISTP, CNKI
body:
| | Invitation Letter from AMSMS2019 About AMSMS2019(Website: http://www.amsms.org) The 2019 International Conference on Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation (AMSMS2019) will be held in Phuket, Thailand during September 22-23, 2019. AMSMS2019 is to bring together innovative academics and industrial experts in the field of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation to a common forum. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental activities in Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation. Another goal is to promote scientific information interchange between researchers, developers, engineers, students, and practitioners working in Phuket and abroad. AMSMS2019 welcomes paper submission including abstract and full paper which is not published elsewhere. Publication All accepted papers for AMSMS2019 will be published on the journal of DEStech Transactions on Engineering and Technology Research, which will be indexed in SCOPUS www.scopus.com. Ei Compendex www.ei.org/, Thomson Reuters CPCI-S ( ISTP) and CNKI Scholar. AMSMS2019 will also be online available in full text via the press platform. Paper Submission Paper Submission Deadline: August 30, 2019. Please send your Paper(s) to AMSMS2019 via email: submit@amsms.org or amsms2019@sina.com,The email subject should be named "Submission". Paper(s) should be of originality, technical quality and will not be published elsewhere. Plagiarism in any form is not allowed, and the authors should be responsible for the papers seriously. Join AMSMS2019 The goal of AMSMS2019 is to bring researchers, engineers, and students to share experiences and original research contributions on those topics. Including contribute your work to this conference, you can also choose the 4 options below: 1. Join AMSMS2019 as Author: Giving an oral/poster presentation on AMSMS2019 with publishing your paper in the proceedings. Please submit your full English papers to submit@amsms.org before August 30, 2019. 2. Join AMSMS2019 as Listener: Without submitting paper or giving presentation, you also can attend AMSMS2019 as Listener. Please email to submit@amsms.org for more details. 3. Join AMSMS2019 as Keynote Speaker: If you are interested in being a Keynote Speaker, to share your ideas in the fields of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation, please send your CV to submit@amsms.org. 4. Join AMSMS2019 as TPC/Reviewer: We sincerely welcome experts in the areas of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation to join the conference as TPC/Reviewer. If you are interested in, please send your latest CV to submit@amsms.org. |
 

Invitation Letter from AMSMS2019

About AMSMS2019(Website: http://www.amsms.org)
The 2019 International Conference on Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation (AMSMS2019) will be held in Phuket, Thailand during September 22-23, 2019. AMSMS2019 is to bring together innovative academics and industrial experts in the field of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation to a common forum. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental activities in Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation. Another goal is to promote scientific information interchange between researchers, developers, engineers, students, and practitioners working in Phuket and abroad. AMSMS2019 welcomes paper submission including abstract and full paper which is not published elsewhere.

 

Publication

All accepted papers for AMSMS2019 will be published on the journal of DEStech Transactions on Engineering and Technology Research, which will be indexed in SCOPUS www.scopus.com. Ei Compendex www.ei.org/, Thomson Reuters CPCI-S ( ISTP) and CNKI Scholar. AMSMS2019 will also be online available in full text via the press platform.

 

Paper Submission

Paper Submission Deadline: August 30, 2019. 
Please send your Paper(s) to AMSMS2019 via email: submit@amsms.org or amsms2019@sina.com,The email subject should be named "Submission". Paper(s) should be of originality, technical quality and will not be published elsewhere. Plagiarism in any form is not allowed, and the authors should be responsible for the papers seriously.

Join AMSMS2019
The goal of AMSMS2019 is to bring researchers, engineers, and students to share experiences and original research contributions on those topics. Including contribute your work to this conference, you can also choose the 4 options below: 
1. Join AMSMS2019 as Author: Giving an oral/poster presentation on AMSMS2019 with publishing your paper in the proceedings. Please submit your full English papers to submit@amsms.org before August 30, 2019. 
2. Join AMSMS2019 as Listener: Without submitting paper or giving presentation, you also can attend AMSMS2019 as Listener. Please email to submit@amsms.org for more details. 
3. Join AMSMS2019 as Keynote Speaker: If you are interested in being a Keynote Speaker, to share your ideas in the fields of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation, please send your CV to submit@amsms.org. 
4. Join AMSMS2019 as TPC/Reviewer: We sincerely welcome experts in the areas of Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Modeling, Simulation to join the conference as TPC/Reviewer. If you are interested in, please send your latest CV to submit@amsms.org.
